suggestions.original: To improve the color contrast in the artwork, consider using more vibrant and varied background colors to make the characters and objects stand out more. For example, a light blue or pastel background could enhance the visibility of the green shirt and blue shorts. Additionally, increasing the saturation of the colors used for the animals and objects, such as the yellow cat and the stack of books, can make them more visually striking. Adding shadows or outlines in contrasting colors around the characters and objects can also help them pop against the background.
